role.argrole: result / final state - marked with ب

example.parse: (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يسع) (NP-OBJ (PRON_1S ني)) (PP-TMP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN ذكرى) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اليوم)) (SBAR (SBAR (WHNP-4 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تكلل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الشهداء)))))) (PUNC .))
